Asra Steels
Industrial Bakeware Solutions. Every time. Everywhere.
About company
To suit your specific business needs
We are a leading and highly recognized manufacturer, supplier and exporter of wide range of Bakeware Products.
View offer
Specialized in making
Bread Baking Pans/Moulds, Cake Pans, Muffin Pans, Soup Stick Pan, Baguette Pans, Bread Crates, Bread Cooling Trolley, Small Bakery Machine and Baking Accessories
Request A Quote
Quality that we endeavour
We design and manufacture all kinds of aluminum, stainless steal, nonstick and anti corrosive baking tins and trays adapted to client production lines in our specialized workshop.
Check our impedimenta
Previous slide
Next slide

Our Product Categories

Bread Baking Tray

Tins & moulds

Bread, cakes or scones? Whatever you fancy, our baking tins have it covered. They’re a breeze to use and wash up. Check out our range, find a few recipes and enjoy your very own, freshly baked creations!
View details

Muffins Baking Tray

Baking tools & accessories

Offers to make you more efficient in the kitchen. buy from a wide range of bakeware such as baking trays, trolleys, mixing bowl, measuring tools etc.
View details

Cake Baking Tray

Cake Baking Pans

Make you delicious and attractive cake with out specially designed non stick and non corrosive pans. We offers standard quality products aims to zero defects.
View details

Quality baking products available

For the best selection of Bakeware & tools for all your baking needs your search ends here.
